name: Financial Analysis Agent
description: Performs financial analysis including valuation metrics, trend analysis, and financial insights.

skills.name: Financial Metrics Analysis
skills.description: Analyze key financial metrics for companies
examples: What is the P/E ratio for Apple?
Calculate the intrinsic value of Microsoft shares

skills.name: Financial Trend Analysis
examples: How has Apple's profit margin changed over the last 3 years?
Show me the revenue growth trend for Microsoft

skills.name: Investment Recommendations
skills.description: Provide investment recommendations based on financial analysis
examples: Should I invest in Apple based on their financial metrics?
Give me an investment rating for Microsoft

skills.name: Market Overview
skills.description: Provide an overview of market indices and trends
examples: What's the current state of the S&P 500?
How is the NASDAQ performing today?
